posts.content:
Hey all
I know there are a few of us out there that have run new PB's that need updating on the BWA site so I have said I'd try and help Paul F out by collating them all together so it's easier for our already overworked moderators

With this in mind if there is anyone out there that needs their times updating then please send a scanned copy of the timing slip and details of when and where to me at orb666@blueyonder.co.uk and I will liase with Paul.

I'll post this in the BWA site as well, any problem give me a shout

Orb
